name: garnished
description: Full stack web app for Garnished LLC

scripts.pubpreview: cd client && npm run buildpreview && npm run pubpreview
scripts.pubclient: git subtree push --prefix client/dist/production origin dist
scripts.pubsecrets: cd server && grep -vE '^(#|$)' .env | sed -E 's/\s*=\s*/=/g' | tr '\n' ' ' | xargs fly secrets set && fly apps restart
